texts.title: Sweet Discussion
texts.content:
What have those lonely mountains worth revealing?
More glory and more grief than I can tell:
The earth that wakes one human heart to feeling
Can centre both the worlds of Heaven and Hell.
texts.author: Liv Tyler

texts.title: Elated Honey
texts.content:
Although I knew that we had lost
The hope and glory of our life;
And now, benighted, tempest-tossed,
Must bear alone the weary strife.
texts.author: Jay Leno

texts.title: Aboard Baby
texts.content:
No, they won’t let me out of winter,
and I’ve promised myself,
even if I’m the last snowman,
that I’ll ride into spring
on their melting shoulders.
texts.author: Channing Tatum

texts.title: Aboard Baby
texts.content:
What is all this juice and all this joy?
A strain of the earth’s sweet being in the beginning
In Eden garden. – Have, get, before it cloy,
Before it cloud, Christ, lord, and sour with sinning,
Innocent mind and Mayday in girl and boy,
Most, O maid’s child, thy choice and worthy the winning.
texts.author: Dave Matthews

texts.title: Square Love
texts.content:
And salted was my food, and my repose,
Salted and sobered, too, by the bird’s voice
Speaking for all who lay under the stars,
Soldiers and poor, unable to rejoice.
texts.author: Denzel Washington

texts.title: Flawless Trick
texts.content:
But most, like Chaos - Stopless - cool -
Without a Chance, or spar -
Or even a Report of Land -
To justify - Despair.
texts.author: John Travolta

texts.title: Aboard Honey
texts.content:
I sat on a gray stone bench
ringed with the ingenue faces
of pink and white impatiens
and placed my grief
in the mouth of language,
the only thing that would grieve with me.
texts.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

texts.title: Wandering Love
texts.content:
What if last night I was the one who lay dead
While the dead burned beside me
Trembling with passionate pity
At my blameless life and shaking its flamelike head?
texts.author: Chuck Lorre

texts.title: Blue Place
texts.content:
Why have you pushed him from his world into mine,
stopped him there and turned his ear
toward my warning shout?
texts.author: Paris Hilton

texts.title: Sweet Range
texts.content:
But still the rich confusion of the sea,
Unceasing voice, sombre and solacing,
Rises through veils of silence past the trees;
In restless repetition bound, yet free,
Wave after wave in deluge fresh releasing
An ancient speech, hushed in tremendous ease.
texts.author: Daniel Radcliffe

texts.title: Aboard Love
texts.content:
I sat on a gray stone bench
ringed with the ingenue faces
of pink and white impatiens
and placed my grief
in the mouth of language,
the only thing that would grieve with me.
texts.author: Ray Romano

texts.title: Sweet Baby
texts.content:
If I could dwell
Where Israfel
Hath dwelt, and he where I,
He might not sing so wildly well
A mortal melody,
While a bolder note than this might swell
From my lyre within the sky.
texts.author: Denzel Washington
